targets.expr: sum by (sfcluster) (rate(solidfire_cluster_node_stats_read_ops{sfcluster=~"$cluster", node_name=~"$node"}[$interval])) + sum by (sfcluster) (rate(solidfire_cluster_node_stats_write_ops{sfcluster=~"$cluster", node_name=~"$node"}[$interval]))
